title: HARD FACTS: How Voter Fraud Occurred in Michigan...
description: Steven reviews the Trump team's legal case in Michigan and looks at what sworn affidavits allege took place during the vote count. He then covers Democrats' illegal calls for leftists to move to Georgia to swing the upcoming Senate elections and celebrates passing Louder with Crowder's archnemesis, the Young Turks.
